uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard

Class BamAdapterFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.picard.cmdline.CommandLineProgram
      • uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard.PicardCommandLine
        • uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard.BamAdapterFinder

  • public class BamAdapterFinder
extends PicardCommandLine
    Class to read matching forward/reverse BAM records and identify short inserts by looking for overlap between forward read and reverse-complemented reverse read. Note the offset of the overlap with new tags in the output BAM file. The records for a given read pair are expected to be consecutive in the BAM file.
